name: Problem Solver
text: Best pizza I have ever eaten! I was shocked at how good it was! The manager, Stephanie Davis, clearly cares about her store and the product they put out. I have eaten hundreds of Pizza Hut Meat Lovers over a few decades. This was the BEST üëç Thank you for such a great meal!

name: Lori Muse
text: Thin and crispy with 3" of crust and a tiny bit of sauce and topping I. the center! I have eaten at this Pizza Hut for 20 years and have had very few problems until this most recent management took over. This is just o e of many issues I've experienced recently.  Most likely lost a long standing weekly customer.

text: This is the closest pizza hut to my house which is about 30 minutes away from my house. I got there and had to wait a long time because they misheard my name. Then I got my food, I ordered 16 hot wings and only got 9.. the food was delicious but customer service was awful.

name: Liz Parker

We tried calling them and at first they would answer and then hang up,  after the second time they stopped answering the phone completely,  we stopped calling after 1.5 hours and approximately 30 call attempts.

name: Razer Fitness
text: Odd to see an old school sit down pizza hut, pizza was great.

text: GGGGGGROSS!!!! NOBODY and I mean NOBODY was using gloves when making and handling the food. We went in to order only to witness the guy making the pizza wiping the sweat from his head and then going back at touching the pizza again!! EWWWW....We immediately left!

text: Pretty good carryout. Just check your box before you leave if you're suppose to get sauce. I've had to go back a few times now because they didn't put marinara with my food.

text: The establishment is relatively clean. The servers are friendly and patient. Food is always made fresh and ready to order. My family has been ordering from this place for years and have always been happy with our results.

text: Horrible service. order was wrong, it was not that busy but took 10 mins for someone to come to front to greet and sit us. Tables where empty and dirty

text: Great stuffed crust 3 topping for under 20$. Worth the price. But.   Little Ceazars has same for one topping 8.90. Incudes tax. They are great too

text: First off, I normally love Pizza Hut, but this Pizza Hut seems to be a hit or miss kind of place. Sometimes it's really good. Other times it's overcooked and not very good at all. We hesitate to order very often for this reason.

name: AmberLee
text: They really need more help. They're very nice and polite but I feel bad because the staff is always running around like crazy. Sometimes there's a little wait, but the staff is going as fast as they can because only 2 or 3 people are there working.

text: Just awful. Only ordered from Pizza Hut because our local Papa John's closed down. When my order arrived, one of my items was missing. The driver was practically sprinting back to his car when I asked about it. He said "It's the wings, ‚Ä¶More

Service like this spells the end is near. They need to get a manager in place to turn this around ... Clocks ticking
